Title: Relates to the removal and remediation of waste tires
Summary: Provides that the commissioner of agriculture and markets, in consultation with the commissioner of environmental conservation, shall develop a plan to remediate and remove waste tires used in agricultural production.
LawCode: Amd §16, Ag & Mkts L; amd §§27-1907 & 27-1915, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to the removal and remediation of waste tires
